title: cintittanbu seidu
sahitya:
cintittanbu seidu kANuvOm jaga jIvanuLLE shivam polivadai


anupallavi

  bandhaminri dondaminrip-parama shuddha samarasamAi
manda mArutam vaLarum kAlai malarirp-pUtta maNattaip-pOlE


caraNam    alaiyum manadai uLLizhuttE ADAmaNi viLakkaip-pOlE
kalaiyarindu nilai niruttik-kaNDa dhIrar kATTum vazhiyE
